com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathManager

Class PatrolPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathManager.WaitingPath
      • com.mygdx.pirategame.pathfinding.pathManager.PatrolPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PathManager

    public class PatrolPath
extends WaitingPath
    This class is used to manage the pathing of a ship while it is not targeting a specific entity
